Edge.description: You're near the edge of the massive cavern. The walls are occasionally perferated by holes too small for you to enter, which at least keep enough fresh air flowing to keep things from going too stale.
Edge.preview: It looks like the walls slope down to the ground over there. You probably can't go much farther that way, and the ceiling gets too low to really fly.

Middle.description: You're in the middle of a vast cavern.
Middle.preview: It looks like an unremarkable area in the middle of the cavern. You don't really see much of anything for some distance.

Air.description: You're flying in a vast cavern.
Air.preview: It looks like pretty open space up there, near the large, arching roof of the cavern. Plenty of space to fly.

Dragonhome.description:
You're in the center of a vast cavern, in the place you call home. Your mother's massive skeleton spans most of the cave to your north, with her skull off to the western edge, the ribcage just to your north leaving you comfortingly close to where her heart once was, and the tail extending off toward the east.

A river winding through the cavern frames your home on the south and east, making drinking water readily available. The various vermin that populate the cave have learned to avoid this area by your lingering scent, but there are always some close enough to hunt.
Dragonhome.preview: You see the center of the cavern, the place you've called home for longer than you can remember.

OverRiver.description: You're flying over an underground river.
OverRiver.preview: It looks like pretty open space up there, near the large, arching roof of the cavern. Plenty of space to fly.

OverHome.description: You're flying in the middle of a vast cavern, over the place you call home.
OverHome.preview: It looks like pretty open space up there, near the large, arching roof of the cavern. Plenty of space to fly.

River.description: The cavern here is split by a shallow river, flowing generally northeast.
River.preview: A river is running through the cavern over there. A good place to go fishing or take a drink, or even a bath.

RiverTB.description: The river here has been diverted a bit further south than it used to be by the massive wall of bone that is your mother's tail's remains. The bone is massive enough you would need to fly if you wanted to head north.
RiverTB.preview: A river is running through the cavern over there. A good place to go fishing or take a drink, or even a bath.

RiverStart.description: The underground river here enters the cave from beneath a pile of rocks, the end result of a long ago cave-in.
RiverStart.preview: A river enters the cavern over there. A good place to go fishing or take a drink, or even a bath.

RiverEnd.description: The underground river here leaves the cave, flowing down into a deep, dark tunnel of unknown length.
RiverEnd.preview: A river leaves the cavern over there. A good place to go fishing or take a drink, or even a bath.

Skull.description: Your mother's skull lies here, much of it covered in rocks from a cave-in. One massive spike of stone in particular pierces the center, the top still black from the lightning blast that knocked it loose.
Skull.preview: You can see your mother's skull over there, stuck in a cave-in from before you hatched.

UnderSpine.description: Your mother's spine arches above you here, morbid reminder of the silent guardian who died well before you hatched.
UnderSpine.preview: You can see your mother's skeletal spine arching far over the ground over there, an easy landmark to spot, even at a distance.

Spine.description: Your mother's spine arches through the air here, far above the ground, nearly reaching the ceiling.
Spine.preview: The airspace over there is broken up by your mother's spine arching close to the ceiling, massive ribs arching away from it to either side.

Ribs.description: Your mother's massive ribs arch down to the ground here like massive columns, chipped and worn in places where something has been breaking off pieces.
Ribs.preview: Your mother's ribs arch down through the area over there, massive columns visible from a distance.

Tailbone.description: Your mother's tail bones extend through this area, creating a sort of wall splitting the area here. The river used to flow here, but her massive tail redirected it a bit south.
Tailbone.preview: Your mother's massive tail bone cuts through the area like a wall.

details.text: You fly carelessly through the air, enjoying the wind across your scales. It's peaceful here, if a bit boring. Some large bats wing through the air in the area but none of them are bothering you at the moment.

You chance upon a small bat in flight, and manage to surge toward it faster than it can dodge. In a single bite, its wings are shredded and its body stuck in your mouth. Your powerful tongue pulls it down into your throat and you swallow, happy with your snack.

As you make your way about, you spot a small rat searching the area for food. Too late, it spots you and tries to flee. But it had ventured too far from cover, and with a powerful leap you clear the distance, deadly claws snatching the vermin. It squeaks and squirms in terror, but you have no mercy for it, and soon you are feeling those squirms work their way down your throat.

Shiny scales catch your eye, and with a quick swipe of your tail you manage to launch a fish the size of your claw out of the water and onto the shore. Desperately, it flops about, trying to make its way back to the water, but you don't give it the chance. A claw through the heart ends its life, and gives you a good grip to get it into your mouth.

rest.help: Fast forward time to recover from your trevails. In addition, you may have a resting event, and also save a checkpoint in case you die or want to rewind.

harvest.help: Spend some time gathering dragonbone from your mother's remains. It's quite sturdy and hard, as well as being elementally aligned with fire, giving it some nice properties as a material.

commune.help: Connect your soul to the lingering shade of your mother's spirit. Every mother loves it when their son calls, even those that have been dead since before their son hatched. She can advise you, and help you focus your powers.

hunt.help: Search the area for prey to kill, or whatever, initiating a combat.

hunt2.help: Search the area for prey to kill, or whatever, initiating a combat.

hunt3.help: Dive into the water to find aquatic prey, initiating a combat.
